attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in PM David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: The PM had the perfect time to demand powers back from the EU. He is a weak leader and makes gross errors of judgement when choosing; Not only friends and colleagues but also policy. Therefore it should be the people who decide on a no confidence vote and not the inept and corrupt Parliament

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament and not the Government.
